data.deskripsi: Designed and developed to meet the project requirements for the Web-Based Programming course. This platform serves as an online hub for alumni, fostering connections and providing a space to share experiences 💫
Crafted as a special digital gift for my partner on Valentine's Day. This personalized website is a celebration of our love, featuring interactive elements and a heartfelt design 💝
Developed as a minimalist portfolio to encapsulate and present my unique ideas and creativity. This website showcases my skills and projects in a clean and organized manner 😁
